about_the_game:
WILDERLOCKE takes the high stakes tactical battles of monster-taming JRPG challenges like the Nuzlocke and adds the unpredictability and replayability of the roguelike formula.

  • 100+ monsters to discover and evolve.

  • 250+ varied moves, 80+ versatile passives (and more to come).

  • A customisable set of 4 moves and 2 passives for each monster.

  • Half of your monster’s stats depend on its species, the others are set by you - build the same monster as a supporting tank or fast damage dealer, depending on what your party needs.

  • A fresh take on the iconic JRPG battle system, with a focus on 2v2 mechanics, building synergies and versatile abilities.

  • Defeat your opponents with a variety of strategies - protect and strenghten one monster, apply crippling status effects, stall and do damage over time, or simply hit harder and faster.

  • Adapt to field conditions like the weather, or set them yourself to advantage your playstyle.

  • No randomness in battle (no critical hits, chances to miss, or moves with random secondary effects).

  • Errors are costly - lose a monster during a battle and it’s lost forever - lose all of them and your run is over.

  • A unique combination of opponents, encounters & monsters each run

  • 12+ different bosses with 48+ handpicked parties & unique battle modifiers.

  • Win runs with your favourite monsters to unlock them as starters.

  • 10+ levels of increasing difficulty, to challenge even the most experienced monster trainers.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: WILDERLOCKE is a tactical monster-taming roguelike. Build up a team of diverse & powerful monsters. Find the perfect combinations of moves, passives & stats to create devastating synergies. Triumph in increasingly challenging 2v2 turn-based battles and become unstoppable.
